section.title: SYSTEM::STARTUP::PAGING::GlobalPageMap Class Reference

para.para: structure of the global page map.

listitem.para: allocated the global pagemap and translates the uefi memory map into it. every that is not EfiConventionalMemory is considered reserved. all memorymaped io is considered MMIO.
